sentence.Network_en: As a matter of course, he was elected monitor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他当选为班长是理所当然的事.

sentence.Network_en: His failure in his mid - term exam was matter - of - course.
sentence.Network_cn: 他 期中 考试不及格是必然的.

sentence.Network_en: If police are carrying arms as a matter of course then doesn't it encourage criminals to carry them?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果警察每天理所当然地携带武器，这难道不会促使罪犯也持械吗？
